Package main

Class GenerateStats

java.lang.Object
main.GenerateStats
public class GenerateStats extends Object
Used for the random generation of various values used throughout the game. Generates names for Team and Athletes, prices for athletes, and reward values for Matches.
Version:
1.11
Author:
mdi48, bsm62

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static ArrayList<String>
    usedNames
    A list of Athlete names that have already been used which is checked against to prevent duplicates.

      public static ArrayList<String> usedNames

      Constructor for the class. Creates lists of names for use in methods.

  • Method Details

    • generateTeamName

      public static String generateTeamName()

    • generateName

      public static String generateName()
      Generates a name for an Athlete by randomly selecting a first name and last name from two respective lists. The combination is checked against a list of previously used names to prevent duplication.
      Returns:
      the generated name for the athlete

    • generateStamina

      public static int generateStamina(String type, boolean isEnemy)
      Generates a random stamina level for an Athlete. If the athlete is an enemy, the value is scaled based on game difficulty.
      Parameters:
      type - the athletes' specialization
      isEnemy - whether the athlete is an enemy NPC or playable
      Returns:
      the randomly generated stamina level

    • generateDefence

      public static int generateDefence(String type, boolean isEnemy)
      Generates a random defence level for an Athlete. The value is higher if the athletes' specialization is a defender, or lower if they are an attacker. If the athlete is an enemy, the value is scaled based on game difficulty.
      Parameters:
      type - the athletes' specialization
      isEnemy - whether the athlete is an enemy NPC or playable
      Returns:
      the randomly generated defence level

    • generateOffence

      public static int generateOffence(String type, boolean isEnemy)
      Generates a random offence level for an Athlete. The value is higher if the athletes' specialization is a attacker, or lower if they are an defender. If the athlete is an enemy, the value is scaled based on game difficulty.
      Parameters:
      type - the athletes' specialization
      isEnemy - whether the athlete is an enemy NPC or playable
      Returns:
      the randomly generated offence level

    • generatePrice

      public static int generatePrice()
      Generates a random price for an Athlete.
      Returns:
      the randomly generated price

    • generateScore

      public static long generateScore()
      Generates a random reward score for a Match.
      Returns:
      the randomly generated score

    • generateMoney

      public static long generateMoney()
      Generates a random cash prize amount for a Match.
      Returns:
      the randomly generated prize amount
